text: Rubén José Suñé (7 March 1947 – 20 June 2019) was an Argentine footballer. He played as a midfielder. Suñé was born in Buenos Aires. He is best remembered as a Boca Juniors player, spending two stints at the club from 1967–1972 and 1976–1980. He won eight titles with Boca Juniors, including the Intercontinental Cup in 1977 and two Copa Libertadores in 1977 and 1978. He also played for Huracán, Unión de Santa Fe and San Lorenzo. He first played for Argentina in 1969, playing six times total for his country. Suñé died on 20 June 2019 in Buenos Aires, at the age of 72. ==Honours== ;Boca Juniors *Copa Argentina: 1969 *Primera División: 1969 Nacional, 1970 Metropolitano, 1976 Nacional, 1976 Metropolitano *Copa Libertadores: 1977, 1978 *Intercontinental Cup: 1977 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Footballers from Buenos Aires Category:Association football midfielders
title: Rubén Suñé
